Free months
Help

How invitations work

Every time a new Nutrita Premium user signs up with your invitation code, they'll get a discount on their first trip (value amounts vary by location).

Once they start their first month of premium subscription, you'll automatically get $US 5 off your next subscription payment.

Discounts register automatically and expire 90 days from their issue date.

Nutrient Density

It scores food out of 10 according to how nutritious it is.

0
5
10

Vitamins

Highest to lowest absolute amounts.

Show all vitamins

Minerals

Highest to lowest absolute amounts.

Show all minerals

Filter by Keto score
Help

Keto Score

0
5
10

Do you know?

It scores food out of 10 according to how likely it is to promote ketosis, 1 being the least ketogenic and 10 being the most. This score is most important for people who are following a ketogenic diet. It helps with planning meals that are both ketogenic and nutrient dense.

Filter by Insulin index
Help

Insulin Index

0 %
50 %
100 %

Do you know?

It gives a percentage score for how strongly a food may stimulate insulin secretion, as secreting too much insulin is the hallmark of many unhealthy foods, like those containing added sugar and flour. This score matters most to people who are most affected by hyperinsulinemia, like diabetics. It helps planning meals that stimulate a low-normal rise in insulin all the while being truly nourishing.

Recipe title

This is recipe heaven for those who don‚Äôt like to cook. Healthy easy avocado boats filled with tuna mayo, prawn cocktail or a baked egg with bacon bits. Keto, Paleo low-carb heaven.

8 mn.

Prep time

10 mn.

Cook time

Ingredients

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10

    • Keto score Good

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10
    •

Recipe

Step 1
Mix the tuna and mayonnaise and any spices you like, add to the centre of the avocado boat.
Step 2
Sprinkle with salt and cracked pepper.
Step 3
Crack an egg into the hollowed out centre of the avocado. Bake at 180C/350F for 10 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your preference.

Goal Title

A high-fat diet (~70%) with a generous amount of protein (~25%), preferably from animal sourced foods, and very low in carbs (~5%).

Your Waist

|
cm
If you don‚Äôt know your exact waist, enter your best guess.
How-To

Your waist is situated just after the top of your hip bone. If you don‚Äôt have a tape measure at home, use your earbuds cable and wrap your waist with it. Compare the lenght measured with a A4 paper sheet. A A4 measures 21.0 √ó 29.7 centimeters.
